executedFeatures: must commit #n concurrent inclusions of EndEntity
must rollback the inclusion a new EndEntity when a Pki collaborator fails with #description
NOP if requested to revoke a already revoked certificate
issue a certificate by sending its CSR
issue a second certificate by sending its CSR
report BAD REQUEST when data sent to be signed is a #description
retrieves CRL with revoked certificates in PEM format
server is unavailable caused by a failure on opening keystore
supplies the current CA certificate in PEM format
supplies the initial empty CRL in PEM format
